website_summaries.verdict: A great motor with pedal assistance so you can switch between pedal and motor power.
pros: This 36-volt 500-watt gearless front motor has lots of power and works well for people who want to switch between pedaling and letting the motor do the work
One 26-inch wheel with a nylon tire and everything you need to install the kit except the battery
Reaches up to 22 mph and carries up to 330 pounds
cons: The controller can be somewhat jerky

customer_reviews.title: Dependable and plenty quick and safe as rear wheel drive.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ! Not my first e bike kit. Original was front wheel drive. Makes front end very heavy and can be sloppy in the corners. Install went very well. Just take your time and think it through ! Very smooth and strong. Just give it a kick with the pedals if you wish. I can cruise at 20 + for better than 15 miles !! That’s moving on a bicycle !!!! 2.2 tires help and softens up the ride at speed. It’s my daily commuter and it works very well. I only use the twist grip. Very controllable and the lit indicator is helpful to monitor the battery charge.
customer_reviews.author: Stan H.

customer_reviews.title: For the price, it's great.
customer_reviews.text: I've put over 1,000mi on this kit now. I taped a little piece of clear plastic over the handlebar display and duct taped the controller to the frame and wrapped it in tape to keep it dry. I do bike deliveries in All weather and it's performed without a single problem. There are certainly better kits out there, but they cost more. For the money, this one is great. I would recommend getting a geared rear hub motor. Direct drive hubs, as in this kit, make pedaling difficult when not using the throttle. Now that I know, my next motor will certainly be geared.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: did not have the free wheel sprocket on the rim nor in the box.
customer_reviews.text: i got the 500w system for my first straight up bicycle conversion, all other builds were purpose built electric bike repairs or rebuilds. first off they say there is suppose to a free wheel sprocket included but there is none. second the rim has an open seem instead of a weld , this would be a problem if someone wanted to use side pull brakes with this system and I am wondering whether or not it will hurt the tire and or tube. I will see. I can work around the free wheel (got extras hanging around) just need to set my mind on which style of bike I will be doing.
customer_reviews.author: Dalzell Venable

customer_reviews.title: Controller died within days of using it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this upgrade kit for my daughter ebike. She had a 300W brushless motor and I decided to increase power since we live in an area where hills are pretty steep to get to her school. It was an easy upgrade. She rode the bike to school 3 times and the controller burned out. The connectors, which are insulated, were fried. Voilamart does not sell the controller by itself. I bought another Chinese-manufactured controller and I could not get it to work. Will probably not purchase another Voilamart product.
customer_reviews.author: Ski4ever

customer_reviews.title: great value powerful kit well built
customer_reviews.text: its a square wave controller which makes the motor much noisier than a sine wave controller. great value and lots of power. the controller is more like a 750 watt so youll need a battery pack that can output at 20 amps if you're going to use it without the speed limiter. i had to get a bigger battery because this controller/motor is very power hungry and kept tripping the battery bms by drawing so many amps when accelerating at full throttle. strong rim and well built but didn't come with a rim strip so i had to use electrical tape to cover the spoke holes along the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Cory R

customer_reviews.title: Needs 48 mm  valve steam tube, might be difficult to install it you have little mechanical knowledge
customer_reviews.text: Has very poor instructions although it's a pretty straight forward install. The PAS system is jerky and dangerous in stop and go traffic, had to disconnect and use twist throttle, seems to work fine on open road. Requires a 48 mm valve steam but comes with a tube that has a standard steam. On positive side seems to have plenty of power and speed, although I do ride on flat land, not sure how it would perform on hills.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good value. No problems so fare.
customer_reviews.text: Had to make some mods to fit my bike, how ever, once dine it works great. I have yet used the battery all the way. I have ridden 36 miles on a trail No problems at all. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Rasmusen

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged, but what do you expect?
customer_reviews.text: Whell came damaged in multiple areas, packaging was crap and the packing foam inside was all destroyed, instructions were almost completely useless, but what do you expect from a budget noname Chinese brand, price was great and it will work and that's what it comes down to it the end of the day. Would probably invest a bit more to get a quality respected brand because this probably won't last too long.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Axle is short and fat. Wont fit some bikes.
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my bike. The axle was to short and to big around to go in my rear drop out. These two dimensions are critical and should have been shown in the product fescription
customer_reviews.author: R. Schultz

product_meta.title: Voilamart E-Bike Conversion Kit 26" Rear Wheel 36V 500W Electric Bicycle Conversion Motor Kit with Intelligent Controller and PAS System for Road Bike
feature_bullets: 36V 500W Powerful brushless gearless motor with approx. 16-22mph (25-35km/h) speed.
Pedal Assistance System (PAS): enjoy cycling while driving electric bike with 220-330LB / 100-150KG Max Load Capacity.
Brake Levers cut off the power supply to the motor safely; Twist throttle has battery level display

Comes with all the components you need to a full conversion, including Rear Wheel(of 7 speed sprocket), Motor Controller, Controller Bag, Pedal Assist Crank Sensor, Cable Ties & Plastic Coil, Twist Throttle, One Pair of Brake Handles, Manual. (Note: Battery not included)
CE approved; 36 Volt electrokinetic cell battery with a nominal capacity not less than 10Ah is required.
